SEW Optimization Service Input.description: Input data for optimization service for Production Schedule optimization

CRF Optimization Service Input.description: Input data for optimization service for KH Picking Sequence Optimization

Local Analytics Input.description: SEW Local Analytics formulated Input to generate Histograms

Date.description: The date in format dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

Options.description: Optional Parameters of the second module to compare

DistinctValues.description: Includes all distinct values for each category

FilteringOptions.description: SEW Filtering Options for Local Analytics Process

id.description: ID of Kit Holder event in PKB (Automatically generated)

KH Events.description: CRF KH Events associated with the Events CSV

Work Declaration Data.description: Data for declaring work on a MODAPTO Module

FrequencyType.description: Frequency type for the schedules request - Valid: 'MINUTES/HOURS'/'DAYS'

module_ID.description: Module identifier for the maintenance analysis

components_ID.description: List of component identifiers to analyze

items.description: List of component identifiers to analyze

window_size.description: Size of the analysis window in time units

SEW Predictive Maintenance Parameters.description: Algorithm parameters for SEW predictive maintenance analysis

frequencyValue.description: Frequency value for the scheduled request

events.description: List of maintenance event data for analysis

SEW Threshold-Based Maintenance Input.description: Input data for threshold-based predictive maintenance analysis

id.description: Unique identifier for this maintenance result

recommendation.description: Maintenance recommendation based on threshold analysis
recommendation.example: Replace bearing in motor unit within 72 hours

details.example: Vibration levels exceeded threshold of 2.5mm/s RMS. Temperature trending upward.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when this result was generated

SEW Threshold-Based Predictive Maintenan.description: Results from threshold-based predictive maintenance analysis for SEW plant

downtimeCostRate.description: Cost rate per hour of downtime

components.description: List of components to be analyzed for maintenance grouping

timeWindowStart.description: Start of the time window for analysis in ISO 8601 format

timeWindowEnd.description: End of the time window for analysis in ISO 8601 format

SEW Grouping Predictive Maintenance Inpu.description: Input data for grouping-based predictive maintenance optimization

CrfSimulationResults.description: Simulation Results for CRF Pilot Case

CrfOptimizationResults.description: Optimization Results for CRF Pilot Case

Module.description: Name of the module requiring maintenance

Begin.description: Start of the time window for analysis in ISO 8601 format

End.description: End of the time window for analysis in ISO 8601 format

id.description: Unique identifier for this maintenance result

timestamp.description: Timestamp when this result was generated

Cost savings.description: Cost savings achieved through grouping maintenance activities

additionalProperties.description: Grouped maintenance activities organized by category

Grouping maintenance.description: Grouped maintenance activities organized by category

additionalProperties.description: Individual maintenance activities organized by category

Individual maintenance.description: Individual maintenance activities organized by category

SEW Grouping Predictive Maintenance Resu.description: Results from grouping-based predictive maintenance optimization for SEW plant
